content: this is a free pattern available on my blog if you dream of being a plant lady but weren t blessed with a green thumb we d like to introduce you to your new bff the amigurumi snake plant this friendly little fella doesn t care what color your thumbs are as long as they can hold a crochet hook pattern difficulty intermediate pattern is written in english with us crochet terminology materials needed worsted weight yarn size f/3 75mm crochet hook 9mm plastic safety eyes black embroidery floss and embroidery needle polyester fiberfill stitch maker yarn needle scissors cardboard 16 gauge craft wire skills needed magic_ring single_crochet increase decrease crocheting in back loops only crocheting in front loops only chain how to change colors finished sizes approx 8 inches tall by 4 inches wide
